description: Zopilote is a family-run agricultural initiative based in Viedma, RÃ­o Negro, Argentina. It focuses on sustainable fruit and nut production, adapting to local climatic conditions and market demands. The business emphasizes quality over quantity, utilizing eco-friendly practices such as composting and circular models. Zopilote also engages in ecotourism by opening its farm to visitors, fostering community connections, and promoting local produce through partnerships with regional supermarkets.
name: Zopilote
